entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
PATCHY FOG
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING EAST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

RAIN
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS AROUND 50
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

RAIN LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS AROUND 60
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
